text: The tenth season of Danse avec les stars, (the French version of Strictly Come Dancing), started in September 2019 on TF1. style="width:20%;"|Couple ! style="width:10%;"|Heart Stroke ! style="width:15%;"|Style ! style="width:60%;"|Music ! style="width:60%;"|Result |- |rowspan=2| Sami & Fauve |Patrick Dupond / Shy'M / Chris Marques / Jean-Marc Généreux | Jive | Can't Hold Us - Macklemore & Ray Lewis |rowspan=2|- |- |- |Quickstep |Hey Mama - The Black Eyed Peas |- |rowspan=2| Ladji & Inès | - | Cha-Cha-Cha | September - Earth, Wind & Fire |rowspan=2| / |- |Patrick Dupond / Shy'M / Chris Marques / Jean-Marc Généreux | Contemporary | Believer - Imagine Dragons |- | colspan=6|Last Dance |- |style="background:gold;"|Sami & Fauve |style="background:gold;"|Patrick Dupond |style="background:gold;"|Freestyle |style="background:gold;"|Voilà C'Est Fini - Jean-Louis Aubert |style="background:gold;"|62% |- |style="background:silver;"|Ladji & Inès |style="background:silver;"|Patrick Dupond / Shy'M / Chris Marques / Jean-Marc Généreux |style="background:silver;"|Freestyle |style="background:silver;"|Avant Toi - Slimane & Vitaa |style="background:silver;"|38% |- |} == Around the Show == ===Host=== Camille Combal and Karine Ferri are back as the hosts of the show for the second year. ===Jury=== Chris Marques & Jean-Marc Généreux, the historical judges are still in the jury, with Shy'm for her 4th season as judge and Patrick Dupond for his second season. ===Dancers=== Professional dancer Marie Denigot announced she will not be back for this season. She's replaced by newcomer Inès VanDamme. ===Contestant=== The first contestant officially announced by TF1 was Liane Foly, on July 19, 2019. Four days later, Linda Hardy officially joined the show as a contestant === Around the Show === * André Manoukian who did the first season of Danse avec les stars is Liane Foly's ex husband. * Linda Hardy is the sixth Miss France to do the show. * Hugo Philip has been dating Caroline Receveur who did the seventh season of Danse avec les stars. ==References== Season 10
title: Danse avec les stars (season 10)
